title: Aníbal Fernández - Wikipedia
snippet: Aníbal Domingo Fernández (born January 9, 1957) is an Argentine Justicialist Party politician, lawyer, and certified public accountant. Throughout his career, he has remained a close ally to the former Presidents Néstor Kirchner and Cristina Fernández de Kirchner. Between 2021 and 2023, he served as Argentina's Minister of Security in the cabinet of President Alberto Fernández. He has held several cabinet positions under three presidents, serving in these offices for a total of over nine years.

title: Aníbal Fernández facts for kids
snippet: After the 2009 mid-term elections, Aníbal Fernández was chosen to become the President's Cabinet Chief. He held this important position from July 8, 2009, until December 10, 2011.

title: Aníbal Fernández | AS/COA
snippet: Entre 1985 y 1987 fue secretario administrativo del Movimiento Peronista de dicha Cámara y luego accedió a la secretaría administrativa de esta institución. Durante el gobierno del Presidente Duhalde, Fernández fue designado secretario de Gobierno de la Provincia de Buenos Aires, secretario general de la Presidencia y ministro de producción.

title: The disgraceful Aníbal Fernández was reelected as president of the CAH
snippet: Previously, Fernández had been in charge of the confederation in a first stage between 2013 and 2016, when he was still president of Quilmes, National Senator, and General Secretary of the convicted Cristina Fernández de Kirchner. The renewal of authorities also brought new names in the main leadership positions.
